## HandleHashChangeOptions interface

An object describing customization for the hash change feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HandleHashChangeOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [shouldResetHashOnEvent](./webshell.handlehashchangeoptions.shouldresethashonevent.md) | boolean | Reset the hash to the empty string after triggering the event. This is recommended if you want to make sure any upcoming link press on an anchor with a local hash <code>href</code> will trigger the <code>hashchange</code> event. |
